value.title: Hollywood's AI Proposal: Cloning an Actor's Likeness and Using It Forever
value.excerpt: Hollywood actors are striking partly because the big studios allegedly floated a controversial AI proposal for background actors.

value.title: The FTC Intervenes In The AI Safety Race Between OpenAI And Anthropic
value.excerpt: The FTC is especially interested in risks posed by generative AI chatbots such as ChatGPT to personal reputations and personal information.

value.title: Kamala Harris Struggles With AI - And So Do Older Workers
value.excerpt: Social media erupted recently over a meeting between Vice President Kamala Harris and labor leaders, where she struggled to explain AI. Turns out, she's not alone.

value.title: The Role Of Generative AI And Smart Data Extraction In Accounts Payable Automation
value.excerpt: A fundamental use case for generative AI within AP automation is its capacity to extract and process data from invoices.

value.title: Seven Ways AI Can Make Your Revenue Team More Efficient
value.excerpt: Dead, lost or stalled opportunities are a drag, but all hope is not lost. You don’t want to spend a lot of time and effort on them, but with AI you can try to reengage them without a heavy human lift. With historical account data for context and generative AI, an AI email assistant can create relevant content that keeps you top of mind.

value.title: There’s Only One Way To Alleviate Anxiety About AI—Talk About It
value.excerpt: Embracing AI as a powerful tool, communicators unlock a world of endless possibilities, effortlessly crafting compelling narratives and delivering impactful messages that leave a lasting imprint on the minds of their audiences. value.title: This Small Chip Stock Is Up 200% in a Year on AI Hype
value.excerpt: Rambus has been on a tear due to optimism surrounding its memory interface chips, and an upgrade cycle from AI. The company has put its past behind it, but investor optimism might be running a bit too hot given the nature of this business model.

value.title: The Last Word on AI and the Atom Bomb

value.title: KPMG is making a $2 billion bet on AI. It's another example of big changes that are coming to the workplace.
value.excerpt: KPMG advises businesses around the world. It's teaming with Microsoft to bring AI to more of them. Get ready for the new tech to spread even faster.

value.title: Apple Vision Pro headset to feature custom-designed DRAM chip: Know what it means?
value.excerpt: Apple Vision Pro AR headset features visionOS, the world's first spatial operating system that allows users to interact with digital content as if it were physically present in their surroundings.

value.title: AI could help reduce fentanyl shipped into U.S., DHS says
value.excerpt: The Department of Homeland Security says new AI scanning technology could help stop some fentanyl that is being shipped in the mail. NBC News’ Julia Ainsley spoke to Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas.

value.title: AI helping airlines forecast weather to reduce flight delays
value.excerpt: The nation’s airlines are navigating a summer of weather extremes including record heat, rain, tornadoes, lightning and historic flooding. NBC News’ Tom Costello has more details on how artificial intelligence is now helping to micro-forecast the weather to help cut flight delays.
